H0.text: what is the capital of modern egypt. Alexandria

H2.text: what is the capital of modern egypt. Luxor

H3.text: what is the capital of modern egypt. Cairo

A4.text: Cairo is the capital and largest city of Egypt and the Cairo Governorate, being home to more than 10 million people.

A5.text: The Greater Cairo metropolitan area is one of the largest in the world by population with over 22 million people.
